subject: Re: How to run setUp() only once for all the Test Cases
msgSnippet: ... You just said it! ... public void tearDown() { oneTimeTearDown(); } ... As in my previous post, read oneTimeXxx() methods as comments. Regards, Manuel
messageBody:
> Please also tell me how to override the tearDown()

You just said it!

Take a look at the TestSetup class, and you'll see. In the meantime:

> TestSuite suite = new TestSuite(MoneyAgainTest.class);
> TestSetup wrapper = new TestSetup(suite) {
> public void setUp() {
> oneTimeSetUp();
> }
public void tearDown() {
oneTimeTearDown();
}
> };
> return wrapper;
>

As in my previous post, read oneTimeXxx() methods as comments.

Regards,

Manuel Amago.
